ExampleDefinition:
Examples/CreateSimpleChart/BoxPlotExampleView.xamlhttp://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.
/SciChart.Examples;component/Resources/Images/ExampleImages/demoBoxPlot.png IconBoxPlot Demonstrates how to use create a Box Plot using SciChart
Demonstrates how to use the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.BoxPlotDataSeries%602.html']BoxPlotDataSeries[/url] and [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.FastBoxPlotRenderableSeries.html']FastBoxPlotRenderableSeries[/url] to display statistical data.
[b]Documentation Links[/b]
- [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.RenderableSeries.FastBoxPlotRenderableSeries.html']FastBoxPlotRenderableSeries Type[/url] - [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.BoxPlotDataSeries%602.html']BoxPlotDataSeries Type[/url] - [url='http://support.scichart.com/index.php?/Knowledgebase/Article/View/17176/28/what-is-a-renderableseries-and-what-is-a-dataseries']What is a RenderableSeries and what is a DataSeries?[/url] - [url='http://support.scichart.com/index.php?/Knowledgebase/List/Index/28']RenderableSeries API[/url]
